bill.title: Substitute for HB 2410 by Committee on K-12 Education Budget - Creating the Kansas school equity and enhancement act.
bill.description: Substitute for HB 2410 by Committee on K-12 Education Budget - Creating the Kansas school equity and enhancement act.

history.action: House Introduced
House Referred to Committee on K-12 Education Budget
House Hearing: Thursday, March 23, 2017, 01:30 PM Room 346-S
House Hearing continuation: Friday, March 24, 2017, 01:30 PM Room 346-S
House Hearing: Friday, May 12, 2017, 10:30 AM Room 346-S
House Committee Report, substitute bill without recommendation by Committee on K-12 Education Budget
House Committee Report, substitute bill without recommendation by Committee on K-12 Education Budget.
House Motion to suspend Joint Rule 4 (k) to allow consideration adopted;
House Committee of the Whole - Committee Report be adopted
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Representative Campbell
House Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Representative Campbell was adopted
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Representative Aurand
House Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Representative Aurand was adopted
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Representative Trimmer
House Committee of the Whole -  Representative Campbell requested the motion to amend by  Representative Trimmer be divided. The amendment was ruled divisible and divided into 5 parts.
House Part 1 not considered due to objection under House Rule 2109 regarding duplicate motions to amend.
House Committee of the Whole -  Representative Trimmer Amendment Part 2 Adopted. vote_tally
House Committee of the Whole -  Representative Trimmer Amendment Part 3 Adopted. vote_tally
House Committee of the Whole -  Representative Trimmer Amendment Part 4 Failed. vote_tally
House Committee of the Whole -  Representative Trimmer Amendment Part 5 Adopted. vote_tally
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Representative Trimmer
House Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Representative Trimmer was rejected  Yea: 47 Nay: 75
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Representative Highland
House Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Representative Highland was rejected
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Representative Jacobs
House  Representative Jennings raised a question of germaneness. The amendment was ruled not germane.
House Committee of the Whole - Ruling of the chair was sustained
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Representative Sutton
House Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Representative Sutton was rejected
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Representative Sutton
House Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Representative Sutton was rejected
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Representative Clark
House Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Representative Clark was adopted
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Representative Stogsdill
House  Representative Hawkins raised a question of germaneness. The amendment was ruled not germane.
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Representative Whitmer
House  Representative Ward raised a question of germaneness. The amendment was ruled not germane.
House Committee of the Whole - Motion to Amend - Offered by  Representative Ousley
House Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Representative Ousley was rejected  Yea: 46 Nay: 73
House Committee of the Whole - Substitute bill be passed as amended
House Engrossed on Wednesday, May 24, 2017
House Final Action - Substitute passed as amended;  Yea: 84 Nay: 39
Senate Received and Introduced
Senate Referred to Senate Select Committee on Education Finance
Senate Died in Senate Committee

votes.desc: House Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Representative Trimmer was rejected - Yea: 47 Nay: 75
House Committee of the Whole - Amendment by  Representative Ousley was rejected - Yea: 46 Nay: 73
House Final Action - Substitute passed as amended - Yea: 84 Nay: 39
